lines.text: My day is coming and you just sit there judging me like I'm some fucking maniac. This is huge. This is everything.
A man of worth never gets up to unsay what he said yesterday... Remember that.
We're out here we may as well see something besides this van.
Hey fuck you, I like the van, we can play tapes.
My day is coming and you just sit there judging me like i'm some fucking maniac. This is huge. This is everything.
You're a fucking vampire! You suck the life out of everything you touch!
C'mon I'm getting closer to the door!
Don't ever touch my fucking map
